prompt:
<s>[INST]<<SYS>>The 'USER' will provide you with an image.Look at the image and create a pokemon stats based on the image. Give the pokemon a fitting name based on the 'main' object/person/animal in the image. Then give it a description(Give it a clever funny description for the pokemon pofessor oak style), type(should be a fitting type based on the image), weight(in kg), height(in inches and feets), abilities(funny abilities), and stats(randomize the stats). </SYS>>

USER:Create a pokemon based on this image:[img-12][/INST]
grammar:
space ::= " "?
string ::=  "\"" (
        [^"\\] |
        "\\" (["\\/bfnrt] | "u" [0-9a-fA-F] [0-9a-fA-F] [0-9a-fA-F] [0-9a-fA-F])
      )* "\"" space
abilities ::= "[" space (string ("," space string)*)? "]" space
integer ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) space
number ::= ("-"? ([0-9] | [1-9] [0-9]*)) ("." [0-9]+)? ([eE] [-+]? [0-9]+)? space
type ::= "[" space (string ("," space string)*)? "]" space
root ::= "{" space "\"abilities\"" space ":" space abilities "," space "\"attack\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"defense\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"description\"" space ":" space string "," space "\"height\"" space ":" space number "," space "\"hp\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"name\"" space ":" space string "," space "\"special_attack\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"special_defense\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"speed\"" space ":" space integer "," space "\"type\"" space ":" space type "," space "\"weight\"" space ":" space number "}" space
